data.text:
All staff were very courteous and friendly. One of the nicest guy was from the restaurant - Kapadokya- Mr.Hasan. Very obedient / polite and helpful. Made the breakfast super fast and kind. 
This was our first stay at Rose Executive. 
Great stay ! 

Rooms could have been a little more spacious.
data.title: Pleasant Stay !

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for taken the time to share your wonderful experience with us online, and thank you very much for your rating. At The Rose Executive Hotel, all our colleagues make every effort to maintain the high standards of timely and quality service delivery and we are delighted that we have been successful in achieving this during your stay with us in Dubai. Once again, thank you for sharing your feedback. All team members and I, look forward to welcoming you back. 
Thanks & regards 
Sameh Elkhwaga | Asst. Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Sameh  El Khwaga

data.text:
Hotel is cool and cozy. 
But the breakfast was nightmare cause the servant touching foods with his hands without wearing glovesü§Æü§Æ also they don‚Äôt have optionsü§ê
Rooms are nice and clean. Bathroom very nice. Lobby don‚Äôt have much shops. Reception teams are very welcoming and treating with respect
data.title: Worse breakfast and servent touching food with their Handsü§Æ

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at the Rose Executive Hotel. We appreciate your feedback at the same time your concern has been addressed. Rest assured that we are taking appropriate measures. Hope you will give us the opportunity to serve you better in the near future. 
Thanks & Regards
Sameh Elkhwaga | Asst. Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Sameh  El Khwaga

data.text: Nice hotel, we checked in early. Friendly staff, good cleaning. All the needs are there. also thanks a lot to the staff for their help and Abdul Rab. There was also a corner where you can take a tour of various attractions in Dubai and beyond üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèº
data.title: Nice hotel

data.text: It was an amazing experience, the whole team is  hard working and very professional epecially Abdul Rab, Sagar, Kiran and Kanwal. It a must stay for people who are on business trips or with family, the hotel location is good and so many attractions nearby.
data.title: Great people to stay with!!

data.text:
I want to say thank you to IMON because I took care of my room, really helpful, polite, good worker, always asking if I need something else.
The personnel is really kindly, disponible and polite.
See you soon
data.title: Thank you IMON
